title: Shopping Special
short_desc: Who doesn't like extra spending money! As an exclusive perk, The Evelyn is giving $50 to Triumph Hotels members, offering you the opportunity to explore more and enjoy more of the city during your next stay.
long_desc:
Enjoy the scenic beauty of New York City. Book our best available rate and get shopping with a complimentary $50 American Express card to use anywhere, anytime. From Fashion Avenue and Macy's flagship on 34th Street to world-renowned museums and iconic restaurants, The Evelyn offers easy access to the best of New York City.

Terms & Conditions

  • Minimum two-night stay required
  • AmEx card provided at check-in
  • Cannot be combined with any other offers
  • No early departure - each room is charged a two-night minimum
